instructions:
Call Summarization 1

For this test, you will need to listen to information that is provided to you through the computer. We recommend using a headset or a set of quality speakers. You will then be asked a series of questions about each of the calls.

You should enter the information that the caller gives in the appropriate boxes on the computer screen. For example, you should enter the caller's first name, last name, street address, city, and/or telephone number in the boxes marked for that information. You should enter any vehicle identification number, License Plate, or Driver's License provided by the caller in the boxes marked for that information.

You may write notes about the calls in the box in the lower half of the screen labeled Notes to help you recall information about the call.

The information you record in any of the boxes on the screen will later be available to assist you in choosing the correct answer.

After each call is completed, follow the on-screen instructions to proceed to the questions about that call.

HOW TO RESPOND TO MULTIPLE-CHOICE QUESTION

With each question there will be four choices labeled A, B, C, and D. You can choose your response in one of three ways.

  1. You can use your mouse to select your answers
  2. You can use the up and down arrows to choose your response.
  3. You can hold down the Alt key and then press either A, B, C, or D.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best summarizes the last record?

options.text: Karen prevented a thief from getting away with the money and videos.
The burglar was foolish about picking out movies.
Friday the 13th was unlucky for the burglar.
Karen was frightened, but kept her cool during the incident.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best summarizes the last record?

options.text: Elma is senile.
Elma thought her house was infested by bugs, but the problem was due to her eyes.
Sol dislikes working with senile old people.
Sol dislikes it when he gets called out to a job and there are no insects to exterminate.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Storm causes sewer pipes to back up and flood.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best summarizes the last record?

options.text: By slamming the screen door, Franklin woke up his son Josh.
By slamming the screen door, Franklin woke up his wife Dorothy.
By slamming the screen door, Franklin woke up his friend Dorothy.
Because Franklin was late for a meeting Josh was woken from a nap.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best summarizes the last record?

options.text: Although Larry and John did not get any turkeys, they could laugh about their hunting trip.
John and Larry's hunting trip was unsuccessful because of Larry's bright orange hunting jacket.
John dislikes Larry's hunting jacket.
If they had gone somewhere besides Swan Lake, maybe they would have been more successful.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Which of the following best summarizes the last record?

options.text: Jane and Will debated over painting Jane's workspace lilac.
Jane's volunteering to assume the repainting led to the room being painted lilac.
Both Jane and Will gave convincing arguments over whether to paint the workspace lilac.
Jane and Will argued over paint color, but Jane won.

The police who were responding to
